requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 or better supported
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600GT a 256 MB or better / ATI Radeon® X1950Pro or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
